actions.name: Fashionable Fur
actions.description:
Effect: Fashionable Fur takes up both the user's Starting and Basic Ability Slots. The user can have a different Fur Trim applied to them as a Camp Action that grants them two Extra Abilities:

  • Dandy Trim: Rivalry and Hiveborne
  • Debutante Trim: Technician and Soul Turbine
  • Diamond Trim: Dazzling and Rocky Payload
  • Kabuki Trim: Own Tempo and Martial Training
  • Heart Trim: Marvel Scale and Lunar Power
  • La Reine Trim: Filter and Steelworker
  • Matron Trim: Unnerve and Assassin
  • Natural Trim: Simple and Last Chance
  • Pharaoh Trim: Sand Veil and Sandstrike
  • Star Trim: Magic Guard and Psy Potential
